Summary: While stopped at a gas station, I noticed a white rectangular shaped object in the sky
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at a gas station with my wife to pick up something when I was just about to enter the vehicle and noticed a very white rectangular shaped object moving very slowly across the sky towards my wife and I with no sound or contrail left behind. Before I could remind myself to take a picture of it, it was already to the northwest side of where I had originally witnessed it and it was further away. I managed to take a picture just before I lost site of it.
trends: There have been 19 other sightings in Bremerton
There were no other sightings in Bremerton on or around August 24th 2012
